response.overview: Inside of his book, adventurous Harold can make anything come to life simply by drawing it. After he grows up and draws himself off the book's pages and into the physical world, Harold finds he has a lot to learn about real life.
response.tagline: Everything he draws is about to get real.
response.title: Harold and the Purple Crayon

results.name: Harold's adventures are getting a real-world twist in 𝒕𝒘𝒐 𝒘𝒆𝒆𝒌𝒔
